reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at the Hotel Caledonian September 12th through the 16th of 2007. The hotel is in a very convenient location - within walking distance to Las Ramblas, Barrier Gothic among other areas. The metro is also very close by.
reviews.title: Great Location - Average Hotel

reviews.text: The hotel in terms of amenities, staff assistance, room size, etc. was average at best. Our air conditioning did not work the entire time we were there (we did have staff attempt to fix the problem but it was never resolved) and there was an odor in the bathroom. With that being said, it was an inexpensive hotel. We don't spend too much time in hotel rooms so the issues were tolerable while we were there.
reviews.title: Perfect
A very good hotel in the downtown
reviews.text: I would not stay at this hotel again.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have stayed here every year for the last 4 years, i think its a perfect hotel for people who are looking for a low budget hotel, location is great. Its not brilliant but what more do you want, for an budget hotel. Would recommend this hotel
reviews.title: Will go back

reviews.text: I stayed in the Caledonian Hotel from the 30th of august to 1st of September 2007 and enjoy it very much. The cast is extremely friendly. The rooms are lovely with comfortable beds and nice bathroom. The rooms were cleaned each day with the beds made and towels changed. Ubfortanely they don't have "no somoking rooms". It is situated extremely close to the Universtate and just 5 minutes wualking to Las Ramblas and Catalunia Square. I used the metro form and to the airport and recomend it. I would definitely stay in the Caledonian if I was going back to Barcelona.
reviews.title: Just Ok

likes.disliked: — room size and small bath + lack of second key card

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed at the Caledonian Hotel Barcelona for 3 nights at the end of April 08.Hotel spotlessly clean , room was overlooking main thoroughfare, but two double glazed doors to small balacony ,kept traffic noise to minimum.Location of hotel was excellent ,and staff were friendly and helpful. Would recommend to friends and will visit again.
reviews.title: Perfecty Located

reviews.text: Had a weekend break, with three friends at the Caledonian Hotel, Barcelona. In particular, hotel reception staff were most helpful. Hotel very clean and rooms had great compfy beds with plenty of space. Would have appreciated kettle and some tea/coffee though. It was a 10 minute walk to Las Ramblas and I would definitely stay in this hotel again. There were plenty of little bars/cafes around the hotel and we were able to get around the city with some directions from the hotel staff. Thank you for a lovely stay.
reviews.title: Really helpful staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just spent 3 nights at this hotel. Great location, staff helpful and friendly. Room was spacious and very clean, buffet breakfast was average but well presented. Having been to many big city hotels this was one of the best in this price range.
reviews.title: Great hotel

reviews.text: Stayed here over the new year weekend for 3 nights. The hotel is in a great location for exploring barcelona and has a few nice bars very close by. The hotel appeared to be recently renovated as the rooms were very nice and clean. Also our room was very quiet as it was not facing the main road. The hotel reception staff were polite and helpful. Overall I was pleasantly surprised with this hotel and would return.
reviews.title: Great weekend break hotel

reviews.text: Just back from Barcelona, stayed 4 nights. Wouldn't recommend this hotel at all. Very basic small rooms, nothing but shower gel in the cramped bathroom, a hairdryer with cold air only, no tea/coffee making facilities, breakfast is ok and served till 10am - if you're a minute late, forget it, they won't serve you, the tiny bar is supposed to stay open until 10pm but the receptionist also covers the bar and if they're busy, they close the bar. It is about a 10 minute to walk to Las Ramblas and there are lots of nicer hotels for the same price much nearer. The photos on the website are very deceiving as the front and lobby area are the only nice bits - the room I stayed in was not as shown in the photos, it was very small. Will not go back there and would not recommend it to anyone.
reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend this hotel at all

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: just a short one this time....went to Barcelona on June 8 and stayed in the Caledonian. All in all nice hotel, the rooms are great, spotless, well stocked, and mine anyway would have had excellent wheelchair access, the reception and staff are helpful and the breakfast was simple, but tasty and filling. The hotel is supposedly 3 star but could do with a 4 star rating.... it is that nice. All in all, with its added locality to ' Las Ramblas ' would pound for pound, be hard to beat.
reviews.title: exactly on the button

reviews.text: We are family of 5 adults and we were planning holiday in Barcelona for September. I contacted the hotel directly via email to request availability and the prices. Was waiting foran answer 8 days and then had to send another email again to remind them about my request. The answer arrived back from them 12 days later on. They did answer that they are fully booked and do not have possibility to accommodate us.
reviews.title: The hotel reservation not to be trusted

likes.liked: — have not had chance to experience
likes.disliked: — the reservation department is lying and not trustworthy

reviews.text: After that we went to internet search to find another hotel. The search results also brought up the Caledonian hotel who actually did have availability.
reviews.title: Not bad but avoid it in this period...

likes.disliked: — Staff is not very kind, terrible noises in this period for works in the building next door

reviews.text: It seems to me that this hotel booking/ reservation policy is to sort out their guests. I only wonder why our family was not good enough for them to stay there.
reviews.title: Good location, not outstanding but fine

likes.liked: — the location and free wifi access
